citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am to 10:20 am
on May 12, 2021.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number on file, and knocked on door.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am to 10:20 am 
on May 12, 2021. 
 
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number on file, and knocked on door.
